The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, they do not realize that an ancient evil is with them. Just when you think it can’t get worse than losing your family and friends to possible desert casualties… They are taken by kidnappers and sold on the black market.

Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. But it’s got vibes that pulls you back again to watch it.
I was repelled by this version of Esmeralda by Russell Crowe when I first saw it but then decided to give him a shot anyway as I enjoy the story with its background and all and now I think he deserves all his praise

Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is going to score big time with martial arts aficionados has some decent fight scenes, but it ultimately fails to deliver when it should be delivering its best work and really offers nothing original with the story or biggest set pieces.
